name: Band Management 2018 UOPGameJam
description:
Band Management Tycoon allows players to create and control their own band. Players can select up to four band members, name their band and choose from three different colours for their tour bus.

The game is played by using the mouse to control the tour bus, you can use the left mouse button to stop/start the tour bus. WASD keys will control the camera, the scroll wheel will zoom the camera in/out. ESC can be used to pause the game. M can be used to enlarge the map and J can be used to open the to-do list. Pressing Spacebar will pause the game.

The aim of the game is to attend recording sessions at the studio to record songs and increase their skill level. The band can perform at the stadium once per day to increase their rating and earn BandCoin which can then be used to purchase new equipment from the shop.

This was made as part of the University of Portsmouth 2018 Game jam by the Three Jammers in one week.
